description:
BASIC FUNCTIONS:

GENERAL

  • Arrive to work area by the scheduled start time
  • Maintain a positive, professional attitude
  • Abide by company policies and procedures at all times
  • Assist in the ongoing cleanliness/organization of the warehouse
  • Assist others as needed
  • Communicates well with Management keeping them informed of time off requests
  • Keeps management informed of challenges they experience within the workplace
  • Other assignments and tasks as assigned by manager

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

  • Ensure a safe work environment in compliance with OSHA and local fire and safety regulations
  • Create a culture of safety by administering and participating in weekly safety meetings with their team members
  • Review monthly equipment maintenance to ensure all warehouse equipment is performing properly
  • Oversee team members loading/unloading trucks/containers consisting of boxes/packages of product/supplies to ensure that team members are working safely and handling items in accordance with Vesta standards
  • Oversee team members to successful complete projects throughout the warehouse to keep products stored in a clean, organized, safe manner
  • Perform Quality Inspections on work performed by others.
  • Oversee the training of personnel in all warehousing procedures including sufficient cross training of personnel assigned
  • Conduct new hire orientations
  • Labor planning and scheduling
  • Drive departmental initiatives to promote productivity and high-quality customer service by reporting on & utilizing key metrics to track and measure performance
  • Implement new concepts and strategies to enhance operational efficiencies
  • Conduct reviews on employee performance within their teams
  • Administer Coaching and Counseling sessions with team members within their department
  • Assists the manager in maintaining the accuracy of our inventory to ensure that the Virtual location and status of an item within the WMS matches the physical location and physical condition of the item.
  • Responsible for the reduction in costs through efficient and effective processes, procedures and leadership

Requirements

HS diploma or equivalent, minimum of one-year warehouse experience.

Benefits

PTO

401k

Medical Insurance

Dental Insurance

Vision Insurance
